name: Running Orbit - Circle Puzzle Game
description:
Running Orbit is an endless game for jumping into the orbits. Tap to jump when two orbits intersects with each other.

Gameplay:

The game runs on very easy control. Just tap on the screen to change the orbit. But tap only when the intersection of the other orbit is close. Also we have lots of cartoon roles with which you can play.

Tips:
1) Energy Block can make the orbit bigger
2) Super Block can make you invincible in 8 seconds
3) Collect coins as more as possible and that'll help you when you cracked

Try to jump as many orbits as you can. Let's see who can be the first in the leaderboard. This game will improve your concentration & timings.
